name: THRIVE (HOTWAXXX)
description:
A game about one tiny ant, and one voracious parasite. Navigate around to grab as many morsels as you can, avoiding the step of larger predators, all the while growing out of control. How much can you consume before your sheer mass makes your death inevitable?

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #36, with the theme of "Uncontrollable Growth".
